Proportion of female students - Step 1

```{r}

body=read.table("../datasets/body.dat.txt",header=FALSE)
names(body)[c(23,24,25)]=c("Weight","Height","Gender")
bodyM=subset(body,Gender==1, select=c(Weight,Height))
dim(bodyM)

```

```{r}
plot(bodyM$Height,bodyM$Weight, 
     xlab="Height (cm)",
     ylab="Weight (kg)",
     main="Scatterplot of Weight (kg) vs Height (cm)")

cor(bodyM$Height,bodyM$Weight)
```

```{r}
# Lower limit
cor(bodyM$Height,bodyM$Weight)-1.645*sd(corr)

# Upper limit
cor(bodyM$Height,bodyM$Weight)+1.645*sd(corr)

```
